directions: In a large pot over medium heat, melt lard.  Cook beef in fat until brown on all sides; drain.  Pour in water and tomato-vegetable juice cocktail.  Stir in onion, Worcestershire, chili powder, salt and bouillon.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer 2 hours.
Stir in carrots, celery and potatoes and cook 20 to 40 minutes more, until vegetables have reached the desired tenderness.
title: Vegetable Beef Soup III
